properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_MEMBER JOIN TB_NONMEM ON (TB_NONMEM.MEM_NO = TB_MEMBER.MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_STATUS NOT LIKE 'A' AND DELETE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM( SELECT TB_MEMBER.MEM_NO, MEM_ID, NICKNAME, GRADE_NAME FROM TB_NONMEM JOIN TB_MEMBER ON(TB_NONMEM.MEM_NO = TB_MEMBER.MEM_NO) JOIN TB_MY_GRADE ON (TB_MEMBER.MEM_NO = GR_MEM_NO) JOIN TB_MEM_GRADE ON (TB_MY_GRADE.GRADE_NO = TB_MEM_GRADE.GRADE_NO) WHERE DELETE_YN = 'Y'
ORDER BY MEM_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT TB_MEMBER.MEM_NO, MEM_ID, NICKNAME, GRADE_NAME FROM
TB_NONMEM JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (TB_NONMEM.MEM_NO = TB_MEMBER.MEM_NO) JOIN TB_MY_GRADE ON (TB_NONMEM.MEM_NO = GR_MEM_NO) JOIN TB_MEM_GRADE ON (TB_MY_GRADE.GRADE_NO = TB_MEM_GRADE.GRADE_NO) WHERE DELETE_YN = 'Y' AND MEM_ID = ?

SELECT MEM_NAME, EMAIL, MEM_PHONE, BORN_DATE, GRADE_NAME, TO_CHAR(JOIN_DATE ,'YYYY.MM.DD') "JOIN_DATE", NVL((SUM(PAYMENT_PRICE)),0)"PAYMENT_PRICE"
FROM TB_NONMEM LEFT JOIN TB_RESERVATION ON (MEM_NO = RE_MEM_NO) JOIN TB_MEMBER ON(TB_NONMEM.MEM_NO = TB_MEMBER.MEM_NO) JOIN TB_MY_GRADE ON (TB_MEMBER.MEM_NO = GR_MEM_NO) JOIN TB_MEM_GRADE ON (TB_MY_GRADE.GRADE_NO = TB_MEM_GRADE.GRADE_NO) WHERE TB_NONMEM.MEM_NO = ? GROUP BY MEM_NAME, EMAIL, MEM_PHONE, BORN_DATE, GRADE_NAME, TO_CHAR(JOIN_DATE ,'YYYY.MM.DD')
UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET DELETE_YN = 'N' WHERE MEM_NO = ?
